text: Uniharula'i jaba hamra spasta ayataharu padhera suna'incha. Ta uniharu bhandachanh ki yo ta matra yasto vyakti ho jasale timila'i timro purkhaka pujyaharubata rokna cahancha. Bhandachanh ‘‘yo ta e'uta managadhanta asatya ho.’’ Ra unako pasama satya a'isakepachi pani uniharu, bhanihaleh ‘‘yo ta e'uta pratyaksa jadu ho.’’
